definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (< vocaliz. Ṣapnĕtĕph ‘ōnḫ i.e. the god speaks and he lives, Egypt. Ḏ(d)-pnt(r)-ĕf-‘nḫ (Ḏĕ-pnutĕ-ef-‘ōnḫ), v. Steind:ÄZ 1889, 41 f.: 1892. 50 ff., so Eb:Smith DB (2), 1798 b Brugsch, v. Dr:Hast. ii. 775a n. §, Crum:ib. i. 665 b Griffith ib.iii. 819 b);—Egypt. name given to Joseph Ge 41:45, Yonqomfanhx, LXX L Yom/.
